attributes.action: Have the NHS raise the funds for John Prescott
attributes.background: John Prescott is a Tom Jones impersonator well known in Wales .. 18 months ago He suffered a massive heart  attack and had to be resuscitated 14 times .. His life is now in the hands of the NHS and they are refusing funds for His surgery .. .. let's make a difference.. let's turn this around

rejection.details:
Health services in Wales are the responsibility of the Welsh Government.  That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into this.

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
